name: Deceptive Perception
description:
Horror games have become a jump scare fest, one after another. Want something different for a change? Let's Twist things up a bit. How about this...You're in control of all the Scaring in this one. Maybe Trapping, or Killing of wondering souls is more your thing, that's fair game here too. Do what you wish to them, and show them what it's like to be in your shoes...Stuck in a Horror game. Let's see how they like it.

A replay-able single player Demo that was made in 28 days as a Solo Project.

Time to play: About 10-15 minutes, or for as long as you want to keep playing.

Note: Graphics Options work if you need to adjust anything, it can be done from the Main Menu. Any setting above your monitors resolution may cause issues, and I'm not responsible. Played for fun because there's no real "You Win" ending.

Hope you Enjoy.

The Twisted Monk
